amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 21, 29, 34, 35, and 36, printed in House Report 112-88 with appropriate modifications which were submitted to the desk.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-88 offered as en bloc # 1: Nos. 3,4,5,7,8,9,10,11,13, 14,15,16,17,29,34,35, and 36 with appropriate modifications submitted to the desk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: McKeon amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent. Various amendments contained in the en bloc were modified by unanimous consent.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. McKeon.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
